title: How to Flirt with a Teacher: The Smoothest Pick-Up Lines

steps.title: Are you my student loans? Because I want you around the rest of my life.[2] X Research source
steps.content: Are you my student loans? Because I want you around the rest of my life. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Are you an exam? Because I’ve been studying you like crazy.
steps.content: Are you an exam? Because I’ve been studying you like crazy.

steps.title: Do you have a pencil? Because I want to erase your past and write our future.
steps.content: Do you have a pencil? Because I want to erase your past and write our future.

steps.title: Can I put you down as my emergency contact number?
steps.content: Can I put you down as my emergency contact number?

steps.title: If I had to write a report card on you, I’d give you straight F’s….for Fineee.[3] X Research source
steps.content: If I had to write a report card on you, I’d give you straight F’s….for Fineee. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Are you my perfect test score? Because I’d love to show you to my parents.
steps.content: Are you my perfect test score? Because I’d love to show you to my parents.

steps.title: I’m bad at math, but I can give you the value you deserve.
steps.content: I’m bad at math, but I can give you the value you deserve.

steps.title: You must be an Ivy League… because there’s no way I have a chance with you.
steps.content: You must be an Ivy League… because there’s no way I have a chance with you.

steps.title: Are you an important passage? Because you’re the highlight of my day.
steps.content: Are you an important passage? Because you’re the highlight of my day.

steps.title: Are you my college loans? Because you definitely have my interest!
steps.content: Are you my college loans? Because you definitely have my interest!

steps.title: You must be an overdue library book, cause you got fine written all over you.
steps.content: You must be an overdue library book, cause you got fine written all over you.

steps.title: I’m learning about important dates in history, do you want to be one of them?
steps.content: I’m learning about important dates in history, do you want to be one of them?

steps.title: Are you an AP exam? Because I would gladly sit in a room with you for three hours.
steps.content: Are you an AP exam? Because I would gladly sit in a room with you for three hours.

steps.title: If you were my teacher, I’d have 100% attendance.
steps.content: If you were my teacher, I’d have 100% attendance.

steps.title: I’d do anything to get an A in your class.[4] X Research source
steps.content: I’d do anything to get an A in your class. [4] X Research source

steps.title: I see why you’re teaching math… your curves are exponential.
steps.content: I see why you’re teaching math… your curves are exponential.

steps.title: It’s kind of unfair that I know all the digits of Pi, but I still don’t know your number.
steps.content: It’s kind of unfair that I know all the digits of Pi, but I still don’t know your number.

steps.title: Care to evaluate each other?
steps.content: Care to evaluate each other?

steps.title: If you were an exam, I’d give you more than 100 points.
steps.content: If you were an exam, I’d give you more than 100 points.

steps.title: Can you teach me how to dial your number?
steps.content: Can you teach me how to dial your number?

steps.title: How does it feel to be the most attractive person in this school?
steps.content: How does it feel to be the most attractive person in this school?

steps.title: I bet you’re great at teaching people how to fall in love.
steps.content: I bet you’re great at teaching people how to fall in love.

steps.title: Since you’re a math teacher, can you add your number to my phone?
steps.content: Since you’re a math teacher, can you add your number to my phone?

steps.title: Want to get together and conjugate some verbs?
steps.content: Want to get together and conjugate some verbs?

steps.title: I didn’t know they let angels into public schools.
steps.content: I didn’t know they let angels into public schools.

steps.title: I would totally stay with you after class.
steps.content: I would totally stay with you after class.

steps.title: So, when’s our next study date?
steps.content: So, when’s our next study date?

steps.title: If you were my teacher, I could write a 100-page paper about how attractive you are.
steps.content: If you were my teacher, I could write a 100-page paper about how attractive you are.

steps.title: I can make it feel like Teacher's Appreciation Day every day.
steps.content: I can make it feel like Teacher's Appreciation Day every day.

steps.title: How’s this for a topic sentence? You have one of the most beautiful faces I've seen in a long time.
steps.content: How’s this for a topic sentence? You have one of the most beautiful faces I've seen in a long time.

steps.title: I wanna A, B, C you later.
steps.content: I wanna A, B, C you later.

steps.title: Oh, you’re a science teacher… that explains the chemistry between us.
steps.content: Oh, you’re a science teacher… that explains the chemistry between us.

steps.title: I know I’m not a teacher, but I can teach you how to fall in love.
steps.content: I know I’m not a teacher, but I can teach you how to fall in love.

steps.title: I know you’re a history teacher, but can you help me out with grammar? I’m trying to get U and I together.[5] X Research source
steps.content: I know you’re a history teacher, but can you help me out with grammar? I’m trying to get U and I together. [5] X Research source

steps.title: I was taught happiness starts with an “h,” but I guess it really starts with “u.”
steps.content: I was taught happiness starts with an “h,” but I guess it really starts with “u.”

steps.title: You don’t even have to teach me about gravity. I’m already attracted to you.
steps.content: You don’t even have to teach me about gravity. I’m already attracted to you.

steps.title: Since you’re so good at math, can you replace my X without asking Y?
steps.content: Since you’re so good at math, can you replace my X without asking Y?

steps.title: If I had to score your exam, I would give you a 14… because I’m the 1 4 U.
steps.content: If I had to score your exam, I would give you a 14… because I’m the 1 4 U.

steps.title: Are you a geometry teacher? Because you’re acute-y!
steps.content: Are you a geometry teacher? Because you’re acute-y!

steps.title: No wonder you’re a math teacher, you’re pretty from every angle.
steps.content: No wonder you’re a math teacher, you’re pretty from every angle.

steps.title: If you were an SAT exam, you’d be a perfect 1600.
steps.content: If you were an SAT exam, you’d be a perfect 1600.

steps.title: I finally understand why kids pull fire alarms at school… you’re smoking hot.
steps.content: I finally understand why kids pull fire alarms at school… you’re smoking hot.

steps.title: Are you my grades? Because I care way too much about you.
steps.content: Are you my grades? Because I care way too much about you.

steps.title: Know what’s on the cafeteria menu next week? Me-N-U.
steps.content: Know what’s on the cafeteria menu next week? Me-N-U.

steps.title: You should go to sleep… Tomorrow, you have to teach the sun to shine.
steps.content: You should go to sleep… Tomorrow, you have to teach the sun to shine.
